message: A quick back-to-basics question, which is more efficient, recursion or looping?

data.message:
لو الاتنين صح؟
السؤال سببه MOOC عن ال programming paradigms بادرسه الفتره دي, بيقول ان ال tail recursion , اللي هوا اساس ال looping , احسن من ناحيه الاداء بالسنبه لل recursion, دي بالنسبالي معلومه جديده, كنت دايما بافضل ال recursion وباعمله في كل مناسبه ممكنه, اقصر واشيك لكن واضح ان ذياده حجم ال call stack في حاله ال recursion بيخلي ال looping احسن

In principle recursion is better especially tail recursion because of many reasons. For example of you do it right you won't have any mutable state. Each function call is a smaller version of the original problem which the compiler can help you optimize it. 
Some languages especially the pure functional don't have loops to being with. 
However in practice you need both.
so the bottom line here is to favor looping/tail recursion over recursion in regards to performance

ال recursion عادة بتكون اوضح و اسهل 
 بس للاسف مش كل اللغات فيها tail recursion
